languages.text: "Хорошо. Только, боюсь, беда эта коснулась не только беженцев". {n}Голос сенешаля мрачен.{/n}
"Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Только, боюсь, беда эта коснулась не только беженцев". {n}Голос сенешаля мрачен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

"Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうしたいのですが、ロード・キャプテン。残念ながら、難民だけではないのです」{n}アベラルドの声は険しい。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうしたいのですが、ロード・キャプテン。残念ながら、難民だけではないのです」{n}アベラルドの声は険しい。{/n}

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。不过我担心，被影响的人恐怕不只有那些难民。”{n}阿贝拉德的声音非常严峻。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。不过我担心，被影响的人恐怕不只有那些难民。”{n}阿贝拉德的声音非常严峻。{/n}

languages.text: « Certainement, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais j'ai bien peur qu'il ne s'agisse pas que des réfugiés. » {n}La voix d'Abélard se fait sinistre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Certainement, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais j'ai bien peur qu'il ne s'agisse pas que des réfugiés. » {n}La voix d'Abélard se fait sinistre.{/n}

languages.text: «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, me temo que no son solo los refugiados». {n}La voz de Abelard es sombría.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, me temo que no son solo los refugiados». {n}La voz de Abelard es sombría.{/n}

languages.text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain. Ich fürchte nur, es sind nicht nur die Flüchtlinge." {n}Abelards Stimme ist ernst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain. Ich fürchte nur, es sind nicht nur die Flüchtlinge." {n}Abelards Stimme ist ernst.{/n}

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan. Ancak korkarım ki mesele mültecilerle sınırlı değil." {n}Abelard'ın sesi son derece kederli çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. Except, I am afraid, it is not just the refugees." {n}Abelard's voice is grim.{/n}
